0.text: Innate: Shyvana gains  5 bonus armor and  5 bonus magic resistance, which are each increased by 5 for every  elemental drake and  Elder Dragon her team slays.
0.html: Innate: Shyvana gains  5 bonus armor and  5 bonus magic resistance, which are each increased by 5 for every elemental drake and Elder Dragon her team slays.
markedPassages: 5 bonus armor
5 bonus magic resistance
Elder Dragon

1.text: Additionally, Shyvana deals 20% bonus physical damage and magic damage to  Dragons.
1.html: Additionally, Shyvana deals 20% bonus physical damage and magic damage to Dragons.
markedPassages: Dragons

0.text: Active: Shyvana empowers her next basic attack within 6 seconds to gain  25 bonus range, deal 100% AD (+ 35% AP) and cause her to strike again after 0.25 seconds, which deals bonus physical damage and applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Active: Shyvana empowers her next basic attack within 6 seconds to gain  25 bonus range, deal 100% AD (+ 35% AP) and cause her to strike again after 0.25 seconds, which deals bonus physical damage and applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
markedPassages: 25 bonus range
on-hit

1.text: Basic attacks  reduce Twin Bite's cooldown by 0.5 seconds  on-hit.
1.html: Basic attacks  reduce Twin Bite's cooldown by 0.5 seconds on-hit.
markedPassages: reduce
on-hit

2.text: Dragon Form Bonus: Shyvana instantly attacks enemies in a cone around the target before applying Twin Bite's effects to each of them. The basic attacks deal 100% AD (+ 35% AP) physical damage, are affected by  critical strike modifiers, and apply  on-hit effects to each target hit. The second strike cannot  critically strike nor trigger on-attack effects, but it will still apply  on-hit effects. Additionally, Twin Bite's empowered attack has an  uncancellable windup.
2.html: Dragon Form Bonus: Shyvana instantly attacks enemies in a cone around the target before applying Twin Bite's effects to each of them. The basic attacks deal 100% AD (+ 35% AP) physical damage, are affected by critical strike modifiers, and apply on-hit effects to each target hit. The second strike cannot critically strike nor trigger on-attack effects, but it will still apply on-hit effects. Additionally, Twin Bite's empowered attack has an uncancellable windup.
markedPassages: Dragon Form
critical strike
on-hit
critically strike
on-hit
uncancellable windup

3.text: Twin Bite  resets Shyvana's basic attack timer.
3.html: Twin Bite resets Shyvana's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Twin Bite  resets Shyvana's basic attack timer.

0.text: COOLDOWN: 12
Active: Shyvana creates a flame aura for 3 seconds, gaining  decaying bonus movement speed and dealing magic damage each 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Shyvana creates a flame aura for 3 seconds, gaining  decaying bonus movement speed and dealing magic damage each 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies.
markedPassages: decaying bonus movement speed

1.text: During this time, Shyvana's basic attacks deal additional magic damage  on-hit equal to 50% of Burnout's per-tick damage to surrounding enemies and extend the duration of Burnout by 1 second, which can occur up to 4 times for a total 4 seconds.
1.html: During this time, Shyvana's basic attacks deal additional magic damage on-hit equal to 50% of Burnout's per-tick damage to surrounding enemies and extend the duration of Burnout by 1 second, which can occur up to 4 times for a total 4 seconds.
markedPassages: on-hit

2.text: Dragon Form Bonus: The aura is enlarged, scaling with  Dragon's Descent's rank.
2.html: Dragon Form Bonus: The aura is enlarged, scaling with Dragon's Descent's rank.
markedPassages: Dragon Form
Dragon's Descent's

0.text: Active: Shyvana unleashes a fireball in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy  champion, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and marking them for 5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Shyvana unleashes a fireball in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and marking them for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: champion

1.text: Shyvana's basic attacks against marked enemies are empowered to deal 3.75% of the target's  maximum health as bonus magic damage  on-hit, capped at 150 against monsters.
1.html: Shyvana's basic attacks against marked enemies are empowered to deal 3.75% of the target's  maximum health as bonus magic damage on-hit, capped at 150 against monsters.
markedPassages: 3.75% of the target's  maximum health
maximum health
on-hit

2.text: Dragon Form Bonus: The fireball deals increased magic damage and explodes upon hitting an enemy  champion or reaching the target location, creating a scorched field for 4 seconds. Enemies within the field are marked once and dealt 30 − 60 (based on level) (+ 5% AD) (+ 10% AP) magic damage every 0.5 seconds.
2.html: Dragon Form Bonus: The fireball deals increased magic damage and explodes upon hitting an enemy champion or reaching the target location, creating a scorched field for 4 seconds. Enemies within the field are marked once and dealt 30 − 60 (based on level) (+ 5% AD) (+ 10% AP) magic damage every 0.5 seconds.

0.text: 30 − 60 (based on level)

markedPassages: Dragon Form
champion

3.text: Flame Breath while in  Dragon Form will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: Flame Breath while in Dragon Form will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: Dragon Form

0.text: COST: 2.5 FURY EVERY 0.5 SECONDS

Passive - Fury: Dragon's Descent requires  100 Fury to be cast. Shyvana generates Fury per second while alive and in Human form and 2 Fury per basic attack  on-hit in either form. Shyvana gains 100 Fury upon learning Dragon's Descent.
0.html: Passive - Fury: Dragon's Descent requires 100 Fury to be cast. Shyvana generates Fury per second while alive and in Human form and 2 Fury per basic attack on-hit in either form. Shyvana gains 100 Fury upon learning Dragon's Descent.
markedPassages: 100 Fury
on-hit

1.text: Active: Shyvana transforms into Dragon Form and  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies she passes through and  carrying them alongside her.
1.html: Active: Shyvana transforms into Dragon Form and dashes with displacement immunity to the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies she passes through and carrying them alongside her.
markedPassages: dashes
displacement immunity
carrying

2.text: Dragon Form: Shyvana gains  bonus health,  bonus attack range, and increased size. Her abilities are also empowered to apply an additional effect. She maintains Dragon Form at a recurring cost of Fury, returning to Human Form once all Fury has been depleted.
2.html: Dragon Form: Shyvana gains  bonus health,  bonus attack range, and increased size. Her abilities are also empowered to apply an additional effect. She maintains Dragon Form at a recurring cost of Fury, returning to Human Form once all Fury has been depleted.
markedPassages: bonus health
bonus attack range

2.text: Dragon Form Bonus: The aura is enlarged, scaling with  Dragon's Descent's rank.
2.html: Dragon Form Bonus: The aura is enlarged, scaling with Dragon's Descent's rank.

0.text: Active: Shyvana unleashes a fireball in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy  champion, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and marking them for 5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Shyvana unleashes a fireball in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and marking them for 5 seconds.

1.text: Shyvana's basic attacks against marked enemies are empowered to deal 3.75% of the target's  maximum health as bonus magic damage  on-hit, capped at 150 against monsters.
1.html: Shyvana's basic attacks against marked enemies are empowered to deal 3.75% of the target's  maximum health as bonus magic damage on-hit, capped at 150 against monsters.

2.text: Dragon Form Bonus: The fireball deals increased magic damage and explodes upon hitting an enemy  champion or reaching the target location, creating a scorched field for 4 seconds. Enemies within the field are marked once and dealt 30 − 60 (based on level) (+ 5% AD) (+ 10% AP) magic damage every 0.5 seconds.
2.html: Dragon Form Bonus: The fireball deals increased magic damage and explodes upon hitting an enemy champion or reaching the target location, creating a scorched field for 4 seconds. Enemies within the field are marked once and dealt 30 − 60 (based on level) (+ 5% AD) (+ 10% AP) magic damage every 0.5 seconds.

0.text: 30 − 60 (based on level)

3.text: Flame Breath while in  Dragon Form will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: Flame Breath while in Dragon Form will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Passive - Fury: Dragon's Descent requires  100 Fury to be cast. Shyvana generates Fury per second while alive and in Human form and 2 Fury per basic attack  on-hit in either form. Shyvana gains 100 Fury upon learning Dragon's Descent.
0.html: Passive - Fury: Dragon's Descent requires 100 Fury to be cast. Shyvana generates Fury per second while alive and in Human form and 2 Fury per basic attack on-hit in either form. Shyvana gains 100 Fury upon learning Dragon's Descent.

1.text: Active: Shyvana transforms into Dragon Form and  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies she passes through and  carrying them alongside her.
1.html: Active: Shyvana transforms into Dragon Form and dashes with displacement immunity to the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies she passes through and carrying them alongside her.

2.text: Dragon Form: Shyvana gains  bonus health,  bonus attack range, and increased size. Her abilities are also empowered to apply an additional effect. She maintains Dragon Form at a recurring cost of Fury, returning to Human Form once all Fury has been depleted.
2.html: Dragon Form: Shyvana gains  bonus health,  bonus attack range, and increased size. Her abilities are also empowered to apply an additional effect. She maintains Dragon Form at a recurring cost of Fury, returning to Human Form once all Fury has been depleted.

3.text: Dragon's Descent will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: Dragon's Descent will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Shyvana creates a flame aura for 3 seconds, gaining  decaying bonus movement speed and dealing magic damage each 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies.
